segment.source: The main purpose of any app is to provide access to content.
segment.target: The main purpose of any app is to provide access to content.

segment.source: In a photo-editing app, the photo is the content; in a travel app, maps and info about travel destinations is the content; and so on.
segment.target: In a photo-editing app, the photo is the content; in a travel app, maps and info about travel destinations is the content; and so on.

segment.source: Content design basics for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps
segment.target: Content design basics for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps

segment.source: Content design basics for UWP apps
segment.target: Content design basics for UWP apps

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: The main purpose of any app is to provide access to content: in a photo-editing app, the photo is the content; in a travel app, maps and info about travel destinations is the content; and so on.
segment.target: The main purpose of any app is to provide access to content: in a photo-editing app, the photo is the content; in a travel app, maps and info about travel destinations is the content; and so on.

segment.source: Navigation elements provide access to content; command elements enable the user to interact with content; content elements display the actual content.
segment.target: Navigation elements provide access to content; command elements enable the user to interact with content; content elements display the actual content.

segment.source: This article provides content design recommendations for the three content scenarios.
segment.target: This article provides content design recommendations for the three content scenarios.

segment.source: Design for the right content scenario
segment.target: Design for the right content scenario

segment.source: There are three main content scenarios:
segment.target: There are three main content scenarios:

segment.source: Consumption: A primarily one-way experience where content is consumed.
segment.target: Consumption: A primarily one-way experience where content is consumed.

segment.source: It includes tasks like reading, listening to music, watching videos, and photo and image viewing.
segment.target: It includes tasks like reading, listening to music, watching videos, and photo and image viewing.

segment.source: Creation: A primarily one-way experience where the focus is creating new content.
segment.target: Creation: A primarily one-way experience where the focus is creating new content.

segment.source: It can be broken down into making things from scratch, like shooting a photo or video, creating a new image in a painting app, or opening a fresh document.
segment.target: It can be broken down into making things from scratch, like shooting a photo or video, creating a new image in a painting app, or opening a fresh document.

segment.source: Interactive: A two-way content experience that includes consuming, creating, and revising content.
segment.target: Interactive: A two-way content experience that includes consuming, creating, and revising content.

segment.source: Consumption-focused apps
segment.target: Consumption-focused apps

segment.source: Content elements receive the highest priority in a consumption-focused app, followed by the navigation elements needed to help users find the content they want.
segment.target: Content elements receive the highest priority in a consumption-focused app, followed by the navigation elements needed to help users find the content they want.

segment.source: Examples of consumption-focused apps include movie players, reading apps, music apps, and photo viewers.
segment.target: Examples of consumption-focused apps include movie players, reading apps, music apps, and photo viewers.

segment.source: a newsreader app
segment.target: a newsreader app

segment.source: General recommendations for consumption-focused apps:
segment.target: General recommendations for consumption-focused apps:

segment.source: Consider creating dedicated navigation pages and content-viewing pages, so that when users find the content they are looking for, they can view it on a dedicated page free of distractions.
segment.target: Consider creating dedicated navigation pages and content-viewing pages, so that when users find the content they are looking for, they can view it on a dedicated page free of distractions.

segment.source: Consider creating a full-screen view option that expands the content to fill the entire screen and hides all other UI elements.
segment.target: Consider creating a full-screen view option that expands the content to fill the entire screen and hides all other UI elements.

segment.source: Creation-focused apps
segment.target: Creation-focused apps

segment.source: Content and command elements are the most import UI elements in a creation-focused app: command elements enable the user to create new content.
segment.target: Content and command elements are the most import UI elements in a creation-focused app: command elements enable the user to create new content.

segment.source: Examples include painting apps, photo editing apps, video editing apps, and word processing apps.
segment.target: Examples include painting apps, photo editing apps, video editing apps, and word processing apps.

segment.source: As an example, here's a design for a photo app that uses command bars to provide access to tools and photo manipulation options.
segment.target: As an example, here's a design for a photo app that uses command bars to provide access to tools and photo manipulation options.

segment.source: Because all the commands are in the command bar, the app can devote most of its screen space to its content, the photo being edited.
segment.target: Because all the commands are in the command bar, the app can devote most of its screen space to its content, the photo being edited.

segment.source: example of a photo editing app design that uses active canvas
segment.target: example of a photo editing app design that uses active canvas

segment.source: General recommendations for creation-focused apps:
segment.target: General recommendations for creation-focused apps:

segment.source: Minimize the use of navigation elements.
segment.target: Minimize the use of navigation elements.

segment.source: Command elements are especially important in creation-focused apps.
segment.target: Command elements are especially important in creation-focused apps.

segment.source: Since users will be executing a lot of commands, we recommend providing a command history/undo functionality.
segment.target: Since users will be executing a lot of commands, we recommend providing a command history/undo functionality.

segment.source: Apps with interactive content
segment.target: Apps with interactive content

segment.source: In an app with interactive content, users create, view, and edit content; many apps fit into this category.
segment.target: In an app with interactive content, users create, view, and edit content; many apps fit into this category.

segment.source: Examples of these types of apps include line of business apps, inventory management apps, cooking apps that enable the user to create or modify recipes.
segment.target: Examples of these types of apps include line of business apps, inventory management apps, cooking apps that enable the user to create or modify recipes.

segment.source: a design for a collaboration tool, an app that has interactive content
segment.target: a design for a collaboration tool, an app that has interactive content

segment.source: These sort of apps need to balance all three UI elements:
segment.target: These sort of apps need to balance all three UI elements:

segment.source: Navigation elements help users find and view content.
segment.target: Navigation elements help users find and view content.

segment.source: If viewing and finding content is the most important scenario, prioritize navigation elements, filtering and sorting, and search.
segment.target: If viewing and finding content is the most important scenario, prioritize navigation elements, filtering and sorting, and search.

segment.source: Command elements let the user create, edit, and manipulate content.
segment.target: Command elements let the user create, edit, and manipulate content.

segment.source: General recommendations for apps with interactive content:
segment.target: General recommendations for apps with interactive content:

segment.source: It can be difficult to balance navigation, content, and command elements when all three are important.
segment.target: It can be difficult to balance navigation, content, and command elements when all three are important.

segment.source: If possible, consider creating separate screens for browsing, creating, and editing content, or providing mode switches.
segment.target: If possible, consider creating separate screens for browsing, creating, and editing content, or providing mode switches.

segment.source: Commonly used content elements
segment.target: Commonly used content elements

segment.source: Here are some UI elements commonly used to display content.
segment.target: Here are some UI elements commonly used to display content.

segment.source: (For a complete list of UI elements, see Controls and UI elements.)
segment.target: (For a complete list of UI elements, see Controls and UI elements.)

segment.source: Category
segment.target: Category

segment.source: Elements
segment.target: Elements

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Audio and video
segment.target: Audio and video

segment.source: Media playback and transport controls
segment.target: Media playback and transport controls

segment.source: Plays audio and video.
segment.target: Plays audio and video.

segment.source: Image viewers
segment.target: Image viewers

segment.source: Flip view, image
segment.target: Flip view, image

segment.source: Displays images.
segment.target: Displays images.

segment.source: The flip view displays images in a collection, such as photos in an album or items in a product details page, one image at a time.
segment.target: The flip view displays images in a collection, such as photos in an album or items in a product details page, one image at a time.

segment.source: Lists
segment.target: Lists

segment.source: drop-down list, list box, list view and grid view
segment.target: drop-down list, list box, list view and grid view

segment.source: Presents items in an interactive list or a grid.
segment.target: Presents items in an interactive list or a grid.

segment.source: Use these elements to let users select a movie from a list of new releases or manage an inventory.
segment.target: Use these elements to let users select a movie from a list of new releases or manage an inventory.

segment.source: Text and text input
segment.target: Text and text input

segment.source: Text block, text box, rich edit box
segment.target: Text block, text box, rich edit box

segment.source: Displays text.
segment.target: Displays text.

segment.source: Some elements enable the user to edit text.
segment.target: Some elements enable the user to edit text.

segment.source: For more info, see Text controls
segment.target: For more info, see Text controls

segment.source: \[This article contains information that is specific to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.
segment.target: \[This article contains information that is specific to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.1 guidance, please download the Windows 8.1 guidelines PDF.\]
segment.target: For Windows 8.1 guidance, please download the Windows 8.1 guidelines PDF.\]
